Books, collection of enormous amount of knowledge and guidance in a compressed form; is a vital asset for the mankind. ‘VINIMAYA’ meaning ‘Sharing’ in Kannada, works on this very basic principle. Books that a student has can be shared with the club and the books that VINIMAYA holds can be borrowed by the students. There's no worry if one doesn't have a book to share.

Wait it’s not just books…! VINIMAYA also shares TV series, Anime, Movies, Ted Talks, E-Books for the one who seeks. Any student can drop into G2C2 room and borrow their favourite book, anime, movie, without any membership.
